Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, west of the Evenborough Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The Evenborough Stables and the Evenborough Inn are located across the street from each other to provide easy access for the travellers just coming into the city. There are a number of small shops in the northern side of town where you can buy something to eat, watch some bards play some annoying tunes, or just walk along the Nylandian Bay beach.
